attributes.action: Give England Devolution and Give the English our own Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long the English have been discriminated against in favour of the Scots, Welsh and Northern Irish.  There is no UK or Britain.  The Union has already been broken - we want fairness and equality and the only way to achieve that is for England to separate from Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

The current Government, because of its high proportion of Scotish MPs, is inherently racially biased against England and its people.

We, the people of England, demand devolution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
